EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_DataScienceAfternoon_NYC_Q216.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for Driving Digital Transformation with Exploratory Analytics and Machine Learning! Please contact Mark D'Annibale <[[mailto:mdannibale@pivotal.io]]> with any questions. See event details below:
Date: Tuesday, June 14th {{my.Save the date:default=Save the date!}} Time: 4:00 PM to 5:30 PM Location: Pivotal Labs, 625 6th Avenue, between 18th and 19th Map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/dir/]]>
We look forward to you joining us!
The Pivotal Team
